::Shredder::

Shredder feels the Cybertronian Fire shaking around him, and then 
recieves the strange message. He frowns. No time for it now, he 
decides, he should get back to Magmatron.

"Destrons, let's get out of here," Shredder says, running out of the 
CF and flying off.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>    The egg glowed at the crust. It sent a coded message to the 
destron 
> degi=nified as shredder... "I have returned. I am whole. You know 
who I 
> am..... I need you shredder.......... I will come to you soon." the 
egg 
> stoped glowing and returned to concentrsating on the transformation.
